title: Shiroi Suna no Aquatope (The Aquatope on White Sand)
synopsis: After leaving her idol career behind, Fuuka Miyazawa finds herself on a spontaneous flight to Okinawa instead of returning home to her pity party in Morioka. Bearing a heavy heart and nowhere to go, she aimlessly wanders around the area until she stumbles upon Gama Gama Aquariumâ€”an aging aquarium on the verge of closing down.
